subject: Fix memory scopeId defaulting for global/shared memories
description: Bug in packages/core/src/memory/global-memory.ts: set() assigns scopeId = options.scopeId || defaultScopeId, which incorrectly tags global/shared memories with assistant scope. Make scopeId default conditional: only apply defaultScopeId for private (and maybe shared) scope; for global keep null unless explicitly set. Update get/query semantics and add tests to prevent cross-assistant leakage.
